doc.title: The Lone Ranger

credit.role: Miner who points out Ben Talbot
Townsman who picks fight with Clint
Jeff Robertson, Treasury agent aka 'Slim Roberts'
Old Timer Who Doesn't Know Own Strength
Yancy Johnson, fake cavalryman who buys supplies

doc.plot: The lone surviving Texas Ranger who was nursed back to health by the Indian Tonto rides with him, on Silver and Scout, throughout the West, doing good while living off a silver mine which supplies him with income and bullets.
